body.name: Wireless Gaming Mouse Bluetooth Mouse RGB Rechargeable 2.4G USB Cordless Computer Mice with 7 Color Backlit, 6 Buttons & Silent Click for Laptop, iPad, Mac OS, PC, Windows -Black

features: 【Please Pay Attention】 (1) If the mouse responds slowly or works improperly, this might be caused by a low battery and will be solved by charging it. (2) The mouse will enter into sleep mode without operation 10 minutes, please click the left/right button to awake it. (3) Please charge the mouse for 2 hours before the first time to use it. The blue light beside the scroll wheel will be on while charging and then goes off when the mouse is fully charged.

【Stable Bluetooth/2.4G Wireless Connection】 The gaming mouse supports dual-mode connection, and meet your need on different devices. Bluetooth mode: support Windows 8/10, Mac OS, iPad, or iPhone Series (NOTE: NOTE: It is required to update your system to iPad OS 13/ iOS 13 or Above and Turn on the “Assistive Touch” on the iPad/ iPhone: Setting - Accessibility - Assistive Touch for an iPad usage.) 2.4G Wireless Mode: just plug the USB receiver to your PC, no additional driver or software is needed.

【RGB 7-Color Breathing Backlit】 Designed with an RGB 7-color auto-switching breathing backlight mode, the wireless mouse can offer you a pretty cool visual feast when using it, especially at night. The RGB lights will auto turn off at sleep mode for power saving.

【Rechargeable Wireless Mouse & Power Saving】 Built-in rechargeable battery, easy charging by included USB cable. In addition, the mouse is equipped with advanced smart power-saving technology, the mouse will auto-enter sleep mode after 1 minute of no-operation. Please do not use the mobile phone charger or fast charger to charge the mouse, because it will cut down the battery life.

【3-Level DPI & 6 Buttons for Games and Work】 The wireless mouse features 3 levels of adjustable DPI 1600-1200-800, which meets the needs of work and most games. In addition, 6 buttons including left, right, forward, backward, DPI and scroll wheel help your work more efficiently. Because both left and right buttons with a silent design, you don't need to worry about bothering others during the session of gaming and working.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 7-COLOR RGB BACKLIGHT 2 COMFORTABLE TO GRIP

3 Adjustable DPI The mouse is equipped with a sensitive optical sensor, provides 3 levels of adjustable DPI (800-1200-1600), is easy to switch, and meets your daily demands of games and work. Noiseless Click Noiseless click design for left and right buttons, you don't need to worry about bothering others, help to find more fun in your gaming, and focus more attention on your work.

Solid and Durable Over 20 million times keystroke test and perform well, ensure the mouse with durability and strong contruction, no need to worry about your mouse button would be broken easily. Smart Power-Saving No working for 1 minute, the mouse will enter shallow sleep mode; No working for 10 minutes, and the mouse will enter deep sleep mode. Just click the left or right button to wake it up. At sleep mode, the RGB light will turn off, and the power consumption will be low.

NOTE： 1. Please charge the mouse with the computer interface for about 2 hours before the first time uses it. Do not use the mobile phone charger or fast charger to charge the mouse. 2. It's out of power if the mouse cursor moves slowly or stops moving. Please charge it in time. 3. The blue light beside the scroll wheel will be on while charging, and then goes off when the mouse is fully charged. 4. When you do not use it for over 10 minute, the mouse will enter into sleeping mode, you can click the left and right buttons to wake it up. 5. The mouse side buttons are not available for Mac OS as Mac OS does not support it. Trouble and Shooting: Q1: The cursor jumps around the screen, scroll wheel has a weird lag? Solution: The mouse is at low battery status, please charge it. Q2: The mouse suddenly doesn't work Solution: 1. Reconnect the USB receiver; 2.Turn off and turn on the mouse by switching the bottom button. 3.Charge it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome looking wireless mouse
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son. Easy to install, comes with instructions, wireless and Bluetooth compatible. Really cool looking mouse. Holds a long charge and comfortable on the hand especially for the gamers or anyone using the mouse for long periods of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Es simplemente perfecto!
reviews.reviewText: El mouse supero mis expectativas, realmente el precio no me daba mucha confianza, sin embargo, cuando lo recibí, quede fascinado, su calidad, sus acabados, es muy bonito, y funciona perfectamente, cumple muy bien con tareas normales y para video juegos es genial! La batería dura muchísimo siempre y cuando lo apagues cuando no lo uses, si lo dejas en modo reposo, se descarga muy rápido, aunque eso no es problema porque carga muy rápido.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke within 2 months!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this Oct 17 2023 Dec 13 2023 it will not turn on. No lights, no movement nothing! It was my everyday mouse for designing but I had to switch to a backup small wireless mouse in a pinch. Of course it's out the return window by a couple weeks! It was cool looking but it's cheaply made and doesn't last !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good overall, but has a few issues
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I like this mouse. It is reasonably priced, it is comfortable, has a large scroll wheel, and the adjustable resolution and colored lights are very nice. That said, there are a few issues that detract. First, it came with NO instructions. However, the product page has fairly complete photos, instructions, and tips, so you may want to save or print this information. For me, the forward-back buttons on the left side would be better if they were a little larger, spaced a little farther apart, and placed a little farther forward. There is a very tiny switch on the bottom, which is all but hidden within the confines of a label sticker, and which is used to switch between OFF and Bluetooth and Wireless modes. In addition to the switch being nearly invisible, it protrudes slightly below the bottom of the mouse. This could, over time, lead to scratching of softer surfaces, such as wood or vinyl, or result in wearing down the surface of the switch. I could not get the mouse to work in Bluetooth mode - it would connect, but would not function at all. It does work fine with the dongle in wireless mode. Finally, battery life is not the greatest - I have only achieved a max of two days use before having to recharge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sastifecho con este producto!
reviews.reviewText: Agradecido con este producto; estoy comenzando a usarlo y se siente la comidad!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kid loves it!
reviews.reviewText: My kid bought this with his allowance money and loves it. His friends asked where he got it all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It looks good, but not necessarily is/feels good.
reviews.reviewText: First off, this mouse looks good. It's not heavy and easy to set up with the computer via dongle or bluetooth. That's where the positives end.This mouse uses a micro USB to charge. It's not a bad thing, but it's leaning towards archaic considering the options out there for its price point. The matted portions of the mouse are smooth to the touch, but the glossy plastic sections feel incredibly cheap. The biggest issue I have with it is the switch to turn the mouse on/off is too long. This causes the switch's sharp edges to rub against the mouse pad or desk mat. Over time, this scratching of the surface can result in wearing down the surface of the mat and cause tears. It sounds like it's scraping the surface of the mat and I'm worried it'll loosen the fibers of the mat and ruin it.It's not a bad mouse, but it would be better if the on/off switch wasn't so long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, works great
